sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"吸收"之意。
means: absorb ：普通用词，词义广泛，既可指吸收光、热、液体等具体东西，又可指吸收知识等抽象概念的东西。
suck ：作"吸收"解时，可与absorb换用，但还可有"吮吸"之意。
digest ：侧重在消化道内改变食物的化学结构后被人体吸收。
incorporate ：指一物或多物与它物相融合，形成一整体。

word_mean: 吸收：即摄取或同化。如使物质进入或通过组织(皮肤、肠或肾小管等)
又如与辐射能反应而使之衰减

sentence.Network_en: The material can absorb outward-going radiation from the Earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 该物质可以吸收地球向外辐射的能量。

sentence.Network_en: The banks would be forced to absorb large losses.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行将被迫承受巨大的损失。

sentence.Network_en: His ability to absorb bits of disconnected information was astonishing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他吸收利用互不相关的零碎信息的能耐惊人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin absorbere, from ab- 'from' + sorbere 'suck in'

encyclopedia.content: 乐队简介 absorb( halyosy , that , is ) 成员：森晴义( halyosy )、笹原翔太( that )、中村博( is ) 前身是由森晴义、笹原翔太组成的S+H后来中村博加入后正式改名为absorb。 成立于2005年，但可以追溯到2002年在nico上的halyosy乐队。 该乐队于2010.12.20正式解散。成员 笹原 翔太 Showta Sasahara Vocal、A.Guitar、Compose、Lyric、Arrange 诞生日：1987.01.13 出身地：山口 身长：180cm 中村 博 Hiroshi Nakamura All A.Guita

entry.def: If something absorbs a liquid, gas, or other substance, it soaks it up or takes it in.

example.ex: Plants absorb carbon dioxide from the air and moisture from the soil...
example.tran: 植物从空气中吸收二氧化碳并从土壤中汲取水分。

example.ex: Refined sugars are absorbed into the bloodstream very quickly.
example.tran: 精制糖迅速吸收进血液中。

entry.def: If something absorbs light, heat, or another form of energy, it takes it in.

example.ex: A household radiator absorbs energy in the form of electric current and releases it in the form of heat.
example.tran: 家用取暖器吸收电流能量，再以热量的形式释放出来。

entry.def: If a group is absorbed into a larger group, it becomes part of the larger group.

example.ex: The Colonial Office was absorbed into the Foreign Office.
example.tran: 殖民部被并入了外交部。

example.ex: ...an economy capable of absorbing thousands of immigrants.
example.tran: 能够吸纳数千移民的经济实体

entry.def: If something absorbs a force or shock, it reduces its effect.

example.ex: ...footwear which does not absorb the impact of the foot striking the ground.
example.tran: 不具备减震功能的鞋子

entry.tran: 经受，承受（变革、影响等）；承担（费用等）
entry.def: If a system or society absorbs changes, effects, or costs, it is able to deal with them.

example.ex: The banks would be forced to absorb large losses...
example.tran: 银行将被迫承受巨大的损失。
我们负担不起那些费用。

entry.tran: 用掉，花掉（大量金钱）；占去（空间、时间）
entry.def: If something absorbs something valuable such as money, space, or time, it uses up a great deal of it.

example.ex: It absorbed vast amounts of capital that could have been used for investment...
example.tran: 它消耗掉了原本可用于投资的大笔资金。

example.ex: It might help if campaigning didn't absorb so much time and money.
example.tran: 如果竞选活动没耗费这么多的时间和金钱，情况或许还不会这么糟。

entry.def: If you absorb information, you learn and understand it.

example.ex: Too often he only absorbs half the information in the manual...
example.tran: 他对于说明书上所说的经常是一知半解。

example.ex: We closed our offices at 2:00 p.m. to give employees time to absorb the bad news.
example.tran: 我们下午两点就放工了，以便给员工时间来慢慢接受这一坏消息。

entry.tran: 吸引…的注意；使全神贯注
entry.def: If something absorbs you, it interests you a great deal and takes up all your attention and energy.

example.ex: ...a second career which absorbed her more completely than her acting ever had.
example.tran: 比演艺生涯更让她投入的又一职业

sentences.sentence: "he absorbed the knowledge or beliefs of his tribe"

means.word_mean: 3. take up, as of debts or payments;

sentences.sentence: "She drew strength from the minister's words"
"The sales tax is absorbed into the state income tax"

means.word_mean: 6. suck or take up or in;

sentences.sentence: "The immigrants were quickly absorbed into society"
"Her interest in butterflies absorbs her completely"

auth_sentence.content: It is worth pausing to absorb what that means.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is worth pausing to absorb what that means.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is worth pausing to absorb what that means.

auth_sentence.content: The body can then absorb and later eliminate it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The body can then absorb and later eliminate it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The body can then absorb and later eliminate it.

auth_sentence.content: The conquered Chinese...have already begun to absorb their conquerors.
auth_sentence.res_content: The conquered Chinese...have already begun to absorb their conquerors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The conquered Chinese...have already begun to absorb their conquerors.

Sentence.sentence: Get off a stop earlier, make a circuit of the park at lunchtime, walk the child to and from school, get a dog, feel yourself moving in moving air, look, listen, absorb.
Left alone, it was assumed, the world's rain forests would not only flourish but might even rescue us from disaster by absorbing the excess carbon dioxide and other planet-warming greenhouse gases.
Nothing makes me feel better than being in one place, absorbed in a book, a conversation, or music.

means.word_mean: 吸收（液体、气体等）; 吸收（热、光、能等）

sentences.en: They absorbed a great deal of the Roman culture.
sentences.cn: 他们大量地吸收了罗马文化。

means.word_mean: 吸引…的注意力, 使全神贯注

sentences.en: The company  will absorb all the costs.
sentences.cn: 公司将会支付一切费用。

sentences.en: They have disagreement on whether or not to absorb those small enterprises.
sentences.cn: 在是否兼并小企业上，他们存在分歧。

sentences.en: The company  will absorb all the costs.
sentences.cn: 公司将会支付一切费用。

sentences.en: They have disagreement on whether or not to absorb those small enterprises.
sentences.cn: 在是否兼并小企业上，他们存在分歧。

jushi.english: Most solar heating systems use large aluminum or alloy sheets, painted black to absorb the sun's heat.
jushi.chinese: 大多数太阳能热水器使用大片的涂成黑色的铝板或合金板来吸收太阳的热量。

jushi.english: The towel absorbed water from the sink.
jushi.chinese: 毛巾吸收了洗脸池里的水。
